embedding.apiKey.label: API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for embeddings (OpenAI, SiliconFlow, or compatible provider)

embedding.baseUrl.label: Base URL
embedding.baseUrl.help: Custom API base URL for OpenAI-compatible providers (e.g., https://api.siliconflow.cn/v1)

embedding.dimension.label: Embedding Dimension
embedding.dimension.help: Vector dimension for custom models. Leave empty for known models.

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context
